BT.managers

Class PlaceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • BT.models.PlaceModel
      • BT.managers.PlaceManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PetriNetPlaceManager

    public class PlaceManager
extends PlaceModel
    Class that hold every object and it's lines. Objects and lines are stored in arrayList.
    Author:
    Karel Hala
